ComicInfo.Summary:
It's mayhem in The Wasteland as Siya Oum's best-selling Lola XOXO has reached its pivotal third volume conclusion!
Lola and her band of misfit allies must stake their claim at a life of peace in The Wasteland, as the battle between the Yellowstone tribes and The Divide reaches its bloody climax! And no Wastelander-least of all, Lola-is assured survival!
Superstar creator Siya Oum provides a thrilling adventure with her riveting story and gorgeous illustrations for this climactic Lola XOXO Volume 3!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------|------------------| | A | Direct Edition | Siya Oum | 1 | | B | Direct Edition | Mauricio Campetella & Justice | 2 | | C | Retailer Variant Edition | Siya Oum | 3 | | D | Comic-Con@Home 2020 Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 200 | Siya Oum | Missing |
ComicInfo.Title: The Power Within
